room_title: Escape room "Japanese Thriller Room" by Music City Escape Room in Nashville
room_address: 2416 Music Valley Drive Suite 135 Nashville, TN 37214
room_description: Lights. Camera. Haunting. A Japanese reality game show is now accepting contestants for an escape game contest. Although more fun than scary, this game is set in the abandoned apartment of the infamous Japanese serial killer, Futoshi Matsunaga, who inspired Japanese thrillers like The Ring and The Grudge. Escape the place where victims fell prey to torturous atrocities and are now said to haunt the apartment.
